longBusinessSummary: Suzuki Motor Corporation engages in the manufacture and marketing of automobiles, motorcycles, and marine products in Japan and internationally. It offers mini passenger cars and commercial vehicles, commercial vehicles, compact passenger cars and automobile engines, compact passenger cars, foundry and machining of engine components, motorcycles and motorcycle engines, outboard motors, motorized wheelchairs, and electro senior vehicles. The company is also involved in the development and sale of land; planning and sale of condominiums; development and leasing of rental stores; real estate brokerage; solar power generation and installation; development of industrial park; and construction and sale of houses, as well as home remodelling; operation of golf club; and insurance agency for non-life and life insurance. In addition, it engages in the building management; production equipment cleaning; cleaning management; painting; weeding; logging; import and sale of wine and honey; sale of water conditioner, mobile phones, smartphones, tablets, satellite phones, gas, etc.,; and operates gas station; and offers general LP gas, factory fuel, lubricating oil, etc., Suzuki Motor Corporation was founded in 1909 and is headquartered in Hamamatsu-shi, Japan.
